practice_phrases.target: 我们同意各自保留意见

practice_phrases.known: She decided to tell the truth
It's important to tell the truth
They refuse to tell the truth
I want you to tell the truth
Sometimes telling the truth is stupid
He thinks telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 他认为说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: Why is telling the truth stupid
practice_phrases.target: 为什么说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: Telling the truth is stupid here
practice_phrases.target: 在这里说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: They said telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 他们说说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: I don't think telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 我不认为说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: In this case, telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 在这种情况下说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: She believes telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 她相信说实话是愚蠢的

practice_phrases.known: Maybe telling the truth is stupid
You think telling the truth is stupid
practice_phrases.target: 你认为说实话是愚蠢的

lego.known: let's agree that it was stupid
lego.target: 我们同意说实话是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to lie
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意说谎是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to wait
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意等待是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to leave
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意离开是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to argue
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意争论是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to refuse
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意拒绝是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to ignore it
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意忽视它是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to believe him
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意相信他是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to rush
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意匆忙是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to start
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意开始是愚蠢的吧

practice_phrases.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to continue
practice_phrases.target: 我们同意继续是愚蠢的吧
